results.content: Nice intro into amp and some useful bits, but needs more depth.  A whole video on not using Bootstrap was a bit much.  The PHP bits could be trimmed out.  More depth on forms would be great.  More stepping through the available amp components would be great as well.  More on how to solve common navigation patterns in amp would be great.
results.content_html: Nice intro into amp and some useful bits, but needs more depth. A whole video on not using Bootstrap was a bit much. The PHP bits could be trimmed out. More depth on forms would be great. More stepping through the available amp components would be great as well. More on how to solve common navigation patterns in amp would be great.

results.content: Good enough. Save me couple of days of reading documentation. It is good if you want to have very quick overview about amp
results.content_html: Good enough. Save me couple of days of reading documentation. It is good if you want to have very quick overview about amp

results.content: I wanted to get an overview of what is AMP was about, and this course fulfilled my expectations in few hours.

results.content_html: I wanted to get an overview of what is AMP was about, and this course fulfilled my expectations in few hours.

results.content: There are few good sources of AMP knowledge out there.  I read everything I can out there about AMP.  The value of this course is that it validated what I thought I was learning on ampbyexample and related websites.  There are a few coding tricks and work-araounds that you won't find elsewhere.  The presentation is hip, lively and entertaining.

response.content: Hey Paul, nice to meet someone else who likes AMP as much as I do! Thank you so much for the kind words, I am so happy you enjoyed the course!
